content.prompt: In Les Demoiselles dâ€™Avignon, Pablo Picasso used jagged planes and contorted poses in order to

choices.label: express his personal fascination with religious traditions of African societies
attempt to transfer his innovative experimentation with collage techniques into paint
make a critical commentary about the exploitation of women in European societies
heighten perceived tensions between viewers and the subjects of the painting

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
